name: drupal/formassembly
description: integrates a Drupal site with the FormAssembly service

suggest.scrivo/highlight.php: Allows form html to be displayed for inspection on the entity edit form.
suggest.gajus/dindent: If you use scrivio/highlight, adding this library will make the form html easier to read.
suggest.drupal/token: Use tokens to send drupal data as pre-filled form parameters.
